game.name: Train Simulator: Battle For Sherman Hill Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Battle for Sherman Hill delivers the ultimate railroading experience, Union Pacific’s crossing of America’s Continental Divide. With “The Battle for Sherman Hill,” you will tackle the challenges of moving heavy freight throughout the decades, from the steam era to the railroading of today!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Battle for Sherman Hill delivers the ultimate railroading experience, Union Pacific’s crossing of America’s Continental Divide. With “The Battle for Sherman Hill,” you will tackle the challenges of moving heavy freight throughout the decades, from the steam era to the railroading of today!
